Constructor Detail

Genealogy

public Genealogy(Environment env,
                 NaturalDomain snpDomain,
                 NaturalDomain haplotypeDomain)
Construct an empty genealogy and populates a vertex for every haplotype. The ancestral sequence is set to 0's.

Parameters:
env - The runtime enviroment
snpDomain - The snp domain of the haplotypes in the sample.
haplotypeDomain - The haplotype domain of the sample.

Genealogy

protected Genealogy(Environment env,
                    NaturalDomain snpDomain,
                    NaturalDomain haplotypeDomain,
                    NaturalSet ancestral)
Construct an empty genealogy.

Parameters:
env - The runtime enviroment
snpDomain - The snp domain of the haplotypes in the sample.
haplotypeDomain - The haplotype domain of the sample.
ancestral - Ancestral sequence on the grand most recent common ancestor.
Method Detail

biPartitions

public NaturalSetCollection biPartitions()
Calculate all possible bipartitions for the tree. This procedure applies only when isTree() return true.

Returns:
A collection of all possible bipartitions.

localTreesBiPartitions

public java.util.HashMap<NaturalSet,NaturalSetCollection> localTreesBiPartitions()
Calculate all possible bipartitions for all local trees in the graph. The map stores a collection of bipartions for the local tree for every recombination free regions in the snp domain.

Returns:
A map of collections of bipartitions.

recombinationRates

public int[] recombinationRates()
Count the recombinations on the graph for every snp. The array corresponds to the snp domain's relative coordinates, use NaturalDomain.toAbsoluteCoordinate(int) to get absolute position in snp domain. A value in cell i counts the recombinations that occur between the position of snp i and i+1.

Returns:
An array of integers with recombination count for every snp in the domain.

recombinationPositions

public NaturalSet recombinationPositions()
Map locations where recombination events occur. Use recombinationRates() for actual recombination counts.

Returns:
A set of all positions where recombination events occur.

recombinationFreeRegions

public NaturalSetCollection recombinationFreeRegions()
A collection of non overlapping sets where no recombination events occur.

Returns:
A collection of sets from the snp domain.

clipSnpDomain

public static Genealogy clipSnpDomain(Genealogy genealogy,
                                      NaturalSet region)
                               throws NaturalSetException
Clip the SNP domain. Constructs a new genealogy spanning only the positions contained in region.

Parameters:
genealogy - Genealogy to clip region from.
region - Set of position to crop.
Returns:
A new genealogy containing the clip.
Throws:
NaturalSetException - if region is not from the genealogy's snp domain.

clipSnpDomain

public static Genealogy clipSnpDomain(Genealogy genealogy,
                                      NaturalSet region,
                                      Vertex vertex)
                               throws NaturalSetException
Clip the SNP domain from vertex to the present. Constructs a new genealogy from the sub graph rooted at vertex, spanning only the positions contained in region.

Parameters:
genealogy - Genealogy to clip region from.
region - Set of position to crop.
vertex - Vertex to start clipping from.
Returns:
A new genealogy containing the clip.
Throws:
NaturalSetException - if region is not from the genealogy's snp domain.

clone

public Genealogy clone()
Overrides:
clone in class java.lang.Object

haplotypes

public NaturalSetCollection haplotypes()
Reconstruct the haplotypes on all the leaves by tracing mutation events on the lineage.

Returns:
A collection of haplotypes for all leaves.

haplotypes

public NaturalSetCollection haplotypes(NaturalSet region)
                                throws NaturalSetException
Reconstruct the haplotypes in region on all the leaves by tracing mutation events on the lineage.

Parameters:
region - Set of SNPs to trace mutations for.
Returns:
A collection of haplotypes for all leaves.
Throws:
NaturalSetException - if region is not defined over the genealogy's domain.

mutations

public NaturalSetCollection mutations()
Trace all mutation events on the lineage leading to all the leaves. The returned value contains SNP locations that have mutated since the GMRCA.

Returns:
A collection of mutation sets for all leaves.

mutations

public NaturalSetCollection mutations(NaturalSet region)
                               throws NaturalSetException
Trace all mutation events in region on the lineage leading to all the leaves. The returned value contains SNP locations that have mutated since the GMRCA.

Parameters:
region - Set of SNPs to trace mutations for.
Returns:
A collection of mutation sets for all leaves.
Throws:
NaturalSetException - if region is not defined over the genealogy's domain.

Sort the vertex and edge collections according to their natural order.
